name: Black Leather Apron- Red Vintage Lining
description:
Hailing from Melbourne Australia is Ray Steels. The go to company for handmade, heavy duty leather and denim aprons. 

Ray Steels aprons are made from 100% leather with 100% cotton linings. 

Hand stitched from start to finish these aprons are made to last. Only using the finest quality fabrics, leathers and hardware sourced by Ray Steels himself.  Each run is super limited. So don't snooze if you see a lining you like, once its sold out we won't ever do it again!

We have designed our aprons to be 'one size only' allowing the perfect fit for the ladies right up to the big boys, just adjust the strapping looser or tighter for the perfect fit. 

If you're a tattooer, never get ink on your jeans again. If you're a barber, keep hair out of your button down and your tools close to your heart. If your a jeweller, keep that gold and silver dust out of your sneakers. If you're a bar tender, look like you mean business. If you're a barista, keep the evidence of spills to the ametuers. 

Email ray@raysteels.com for any enquiries.
